name: Hazman
description:
Keyboard : WASD to move. Space or mouse click to dash. 

Controller : A to dash

"Hazman" is a survival top-down game made in Unity. You play as Hazman, a scientist who's job is to collect a mysterious alien monster's DNA. In order to do so, you have to collect 10 DNA samples while avoiding the alien's attacks.

Be quick to avoid the monster's acid tears and tentacle slams in order to survive just another day at the job.
This game was created during week 182 of Weekly Game Jam by Team Monkey Haha.
